title: Drawing, "Design for Knitted Stockings", 20th century
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on illustration board
inscribed: At bottom right: multicolor long socks/ rose gathers (?) tasseled/ under fold over tops
description: Drawing of girls' legs wearing a black skirt, stripped knee high socks (black, white, pink, periwinkle, and celydon) and black Mary-Jane type shoes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Knitted Stockings", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and gouache, graphite on illustration board. Gift of Hilary Knight. 1988-7-28.
